channel.title: CVE Feed for Merv Barrett -- all

item.title: CVE-2020-5530|2024-08-04T08:30:24.549Z -- merv%20barrett -- easy%20property%20listings
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Easy Property Listings versions prior to 3.4 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-32799|2024-08-02T02:20:35.516Z -- merv%20barrett -- easy%20property%20listings
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Merv Barrett Easy Property Listings.This issue affects Easy Property Listings: from n/a through 3.5.3.
